Introduction
This topic contains information on the impact of historical herbicide exposure policies, including
overview of historical policies regarding herbicide exposure and nautical service
, and
benefits previously awarded under historical policies
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Ratings for Disabilities Associated with Herbicide Exposure
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
